name: Massive Unicorn Slaughter
description:
Tower Defense game in two worlds: In one you fight, in the other you gatter resources.

  • Destroy the most beautiful fantasy world to support your warfare
  • Slaughter peaceful unicorns 
  • Defeat frightening monsters with your towers
  • Guard your base

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • RETURN / E - Build Towers and Tiles
  • TAB / Q - Change Tower
  • SCROLLING - Zoom

Credits
